subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
author: Rj
full_text:
--0-1538449292-1255617966=:49646
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

F-S, I certainly hope I didn't offend you with anything I said.=A0 I certai=
nly do not claim to be a braniac or a know-it-all, as you have called me in=
 your post.

In fact I am saying the opposite: I am saying that I do not kn=
ow:=A0 I am saying I do not know how anyone can believe these 2012 predicti=
ons when all they have is stories and questionable claims.=A0 I don't know =
how they can believe this stuff when they actually DO have evidence that al=
l the similar claims in the past have been shown to be false. I do not know=
 why they believe this claim is any more justified than all the others,

I =
do not know how the group can say on its home page " It's one thing to be s=
keptical, it's another to ignore and deny all evidence.", yet it is the peo=
ple who are certain of the 2012 prophecies that seem to be ignoring and den=
ying evidence that it is only one more in a long line of unsupported failed=
 predictions, not those who are skeptical of it.

I do not know how it just=
ifies you referring to me as=A0 a "wanne be brianiacs claiming to know all"=
, when the group home page suggests such attacks get people banned.=A0 I do=
 not know how being skeptical of a future prophecy makes one a know it all.=
 And I do not know how prompting people to judge for themselves makes me a =
know it all. 

And I don't know why the group home page says a good argumen=
t is ok, yet you start name-calling offended when someone questions somethi=
ng you do not agree with, or proposes a theory alternate to your own.

So c=
all me ignorant.=A0 Obviously I really don't know very much at all.=A0 

Bu=
t of the very few things I do know, I now it is good to question, and not t=
ake everything, especially prophecies, at face value.=A0 And I know the bes=
t way to test a prophecy, and the people making them, is to see if they act=
ually come to pass.=A0 And I know that since no evidence can support a prop=
hecy's truth until it comes to pass, and since all past end-of-world prophe=
cies have no evidence of their success, that those who think they know some=
thing special about why 2012 is different, certainly know more than I.

And=
 so I hope they (or you, if you count yourself among them) will post your e=
vidence, and your predictions, and your dates.=A0 And we won't have to argu=
e about it.=A0 We can just put that person, and their predictions, and thei=
r dates, on our calendars, and judge when the date comes, who was really ac=
ting as a know-it-all.=A0 

One thing I think we can all agree on:=A0 one k=
nows it all. Not me, not you, and certainly not a collapsed MesoAmerican ci=
vilization.

Rj





--- On Wed, 10/14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengi=
rl@...> wrote:

From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...>
S=
ubject: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date=
: Wednesday, October 14, 2009, 6:56 PM






=A0




    
                 =
  I stopped getting the group e-mail months ago, I should also stop reading=
 the posts as well. All these groups are full of wanne be brianiacs claimin=
g to know all, and laugh at anyone that gets voices outside of the little m=
icro paranormal world. And that is not aimed at April!--RJ



F-S



--- In=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote:

>

> Wow=
..some how, I missed getting a bunch of messages it appears.

> 

> To Fran=
k - don't shoot the messenger. Just sayin'

> 

>   ----- Original Message =
----- 

>   From: Rj 

>   To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 

>   Sent: Wednesd=
ay, October 14, 2009 4:13 PM

>   Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: 2012 is not th=
e end!

> 

> 

>     Other than various claims, there is no evidence that =
anything will happen in  2012: it will be the same as every other end-of-wo=
rld prediction made before.

> 

>         Then someone will "recalculate" =
, or proclaim a new EVP message, and point at 2013!  Or 2014!  

> 

>     =
    However, I really do like it when people pick specific dates for predic=
tions.  Besides being entertaining, it gives everyone a chance to judge for=
 themselves just how much the predictor is like all the others who have mar=
ched around carrying  those "THE END OF THE WORLD IS NIGH" signs.  Full of =
nothing but themselves and their  delusions.

> 

>         --- On Wed, 10/=
14/09, purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ ...> wrote:

> 

> 

>          =
 From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@ ...>

>           Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: 2012 is not the end!

>           To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

> =
          Date: Wednesday, October 14, 2009, 2:59 PM

> 

> 

>            =
 

>           And you can expect the debunking to escalate, but go ahead--=
everyone knows the media always tells the truth. 

>           Trillions of=
 $$$ are missing, and some suspect it's been used to build secret bunkers f=
or the elite to ride out the shift in, and you think they are not going to =
spend a bit more on dis-information to keep panicked hords from over runnin=
g their hidy holes. 

> 

>           These same sources you quote will als=
o tell you there are no sprits, hence no EVP, yet you don't believe that. 
=

> 

>           Besides, it is not just the Mayans, every freaking culture=
 in the world has the exact same predictions- the exact same date-just coin=
cidence no doubt! You expect some bozo that has as much in common with maya=
n calendar creators as I have with the man in the moon to know anything at =
all about it. I can go and on...Experts all and everyone has an opinion tha=
t is gospel and unquestionable. You can find any information you want to he=
ar, whether it's EVP or 2012.

> 

>           You better take a closer loo=
k at your world, if nothing happens to change this crap hole, the future is=
 extrememly bleak-- a slow rotting death that goes on for milenia. 

> 

> =
          F-S

>
